sentences.en: a complex system of highways
sentences.cn: 复杂的公路网

sentences.en: a three-story apartment complex
sentences.cn: 三层的综合公寓大楼

sentences.en: Air ducts and electrical cables were threaded through the complex structure.
sentences.cn: 通风管和电缆在这幢结构复杂的建筑物中穿过。

sentences.en: Avoid complex verbal constructions.
sentences.cn: 避免使用复杂的动词结构。

sentences.en: Both of them had the ability to present complex matters lucidly.
sentences.cn: 两人都具有深入浅出地表述复杂事物的能力。

sentences.en: Douglas was a complex man, thoughtful, gallant, and generous.
sentences.cn: 道格拉斯让人捉摸不透，他体贴周到，对女孩子颇为殷勤，而且慷慨大方。

sentences.en: He was an unusually complex man.
sentences.cn: 他是个极其复杂的人。

sentences.en: He's unsympathetic, but charismatic and complex.
sentences.cn: 他很讨人厌，但很有感召力，令人捉摸不透。

sentences.en: I had a persecution complex and thought people were conspiring against me.
sentences.cn: 我有过被害情结，认为大家都在密谋暗算我。

sentences.en: In this new book, Harrison brilliantly disentangles complex debates.
sentences.cn: 在这本新作中，哈里森巧妙地理顺了那些纷繁复杂的争论。

sentences.en: It is a complex system, but it certainly makes a change.
sentences.cn: 这是个复杂的体系，不过确实有所改变。

sentences.en: It was a very complex relationship between two complex people.
sentences.cn: 这是两个复杂的人之间非常复杂的关系。

sentences.en: Peter seemed to have an instant understanding of the most complex issues.
sentences.cn: 再复杂的问题彼得似乎也是一看就明白。

sentences.en: Photosynthesis is a highly complex process.
sentences.cn: 光合作用是一个非常复杂的过程。

sentences.en: Protein molecules compose all the complex working parts of living cells.
sentences.cn: 活细胞中所有复杂的运行成分都由蛋白质分子构成。

sentences.en: The causes are a complex blend of local and national tensions.
sentences.cn: 原因很复杂，既有地方性冲突也有全国范围的紧张局势。

sentences.en: The complex opens to the public tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 这幢综合大楼将于明天对公众开放。

sentences.en: The reality is rather more complex.
sentences.cn: 事实要更加复杂。

sentences.en: The students work in groups on complex problems.
sentences.cn: 学生们分组研究复杂的问题。

sentences.en: The subject of racism is admittedly too complex for facile summarization.
sentences.cn: 无可否认，种族主义这个话题太过复杂，不可能一言蔽之。

sentences.en: The town has one of the best leisure complexes in the country.
sentences.cn: 该镇拥有全国最好的娱乐休闲广场之一。

words.tran_cn: 复杂，复杂性；复杂错综的事物

phrases.tran_cn: n. 复分析；复变分析；复变函数论
复平面；高斯平面；复变量平面
复合结构；复结构；复数结构
金属络合物，金属络合盐；金属复合物
石油化工总厂；石油化工（总）公司

trans.tran_en: consisting of many different parts and often difficult to understand

trans.tran_cn: 综合建筑群，相关联的一组事物，复合体，情结，忧虑
trans.tran_en: a large number of things which are closely related
